copyFile

static void copyFile(java.io.File sourceFile, java.io.File destFile)
Copies a files contents from one file to another and flushes. Note: We use FileChannel instead of FileUtils.copyFile to ensure a synchronous forced save. This helps ensures files exist on the disk before a war file is created.
Parameters:
sourcceFile - the originating file we want to copy
destFile - the destination file object we want to save to

static java.lang.Object fileForUriIfHasAnyAssetType(java.lang.String uri, java.lang.Object possibleFileSpecs, java.lang.Object baseFile = null)
Parameters:
uri - the string of the asset uri.
possibleFileSpecs - is a list of possible file specs that the file for the uri can belong to.
Returns:
an AssetFile for the corresponding uri.
